data.title: Gordon Brown, ‘Britishness’ and the Negation of England
data.meta_description: On becoming leader of the Labour Party and Prime Minister, Gordon Brown sought to distance himself from the previous decade of New Labour government under Tony Blair. He claimed that the security, environmental and economic challenges confronting the United Kingdom...
